Package com.github.tommyettinger.anim8

Interface Dithered

All Known Implementing Classes:
AnimatedGif, FastGif, FastPNG8, PNG8
public interface Dithered
A renderer and/or writer that allows selecting a Dithered.DitherAlgorithm for its output.
Created by Tommy Ettinger on 6/6/2020.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    static enum 
    Dithered.DitherAlgorithm
    Represents a choice of dithering algorithm to apply when writing a high-color image with a color-limited format.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Dithered.DitherAlgorithm
    getDitherAlgorithm()
    Gets the Dithered.DitherAlgorithm this is currently using.
    PaletteReducer
    getPalette()
    Gets the PaletteReducer this uses to lower the color count in an image.
    void
    setDitherAlgorithm(Dithered.DitherAlgorithm ditherAlgorithm)
    Sets the dither algorithm (or disables it) using an enum constant from Dithered.DitherAlgorithm.
    void
    setPalette(PaletteReducer palette)
    Sets the PaletteReducer this uses to bring a high-color or different-palette image down to a smaller palette size.

  • Method Details

    • getPalette

      PaletteReducer getPalette()
      Gets the PaletteReducer this uses to lower the color count in an image. If the PaletteReducer is null, this should try to assign itself a PaletteReducer when given a new image.
      Returns:
      the PaletteReducer this uses; may be null

    • setPalette

      void setPalette(PaletteReducer palette)
      Sets the PaletteReducer this uses to bring a high-color or different-palette image down to a smaller palette size. If palette is null, this should try to assign itself a PaletteReducer when given a new image.
      Parameters:
      palette - a PaletteReducer that is often pre-configured with a specific palette; null is usually allowed

    • getDitherAlgorithm

      Dithered.DitherAlgorithm getDitherAlgorithm()
      Gets the Dithered.DitherAlgorithm this is currently using.
      Returns:
      which dithering algorithm this currently uses.

    • setDitherAlgorithm

      void setDitherAlgorithm(Dithered.DitherAlgorithm ditherAlgorithm)
      Sets the dither algorithm (or disables it) using an enum constant from Dithered.DitherAlgorithm. If this is given null, it instead does nothing.
      Parameters:
      ditherAlgorithm - which Dithered.DitherAlgorithm to use for upcoming output
